member.name: T:Xceed.Words.NET.Licenser
member.summary: Represents the class that registers the classes defined in the Xceed.Words.NET assembly.

member.summary: Converts a DocX document into a PDF document.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Copy
member.summary: Copies the document into a new Document.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Load
member.summary: Loads a document into a DocX object.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.ConvertToPdf(Xceed.Document.NET.Document,System.String)
member.summary: Converts a DocX document into a PDF document, and saves it to the provided filename.

span.style: FONT-SIZE: 13px; FONT-FAMILY: "Segoe UI", Verdana, Arial; WHITE-SPACE: normal; WORD-SPACING: 0px; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; FLOAT: none; FONT-WEIGHT: 400; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); FONT-STYLE: normal; ORPHANS: 2; WIDOWS: 2; DISPLAY: inline !important; LETTER-SPACING: normal; TEXT-INDENT: 0px; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial

param.name: outputFileName

span.style: FONT-SIZE: 13px; FONT-FAMILY: "Segoe UI", Verdana, Arial; WHITE-SPACE: normal; WORD-SPACING: 0px; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; FLOAT: none; FONT-WEIGHT: 400; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); FONT-STYLE: normal; ORPHANS: 2; WIDOWS: 2; DISPLAY: inline !important; LETTER-SPACING: normal; TEXT-INDENT: 0px; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial

param.span: The filename of the PDF file to create. The ".pdf" extension is added automatically if the provided name does not end with ".pdf".

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.ConvertToPdf(Xceed.Document.NET.Document,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Converts a DocX document into a PDF document, and saves it to the provided output stream.

param.name: outputStream

span.style: FONT-SIZE: 13px; FONT-FAMILY: "Segoe UI", Verdana, Arial; WHITE-SPACE: normal; WORD-SPACING: 0px; TEXT-TRANSFORM: none; FLOAT: none; FONT-WEIGHT: 400; COLOR: rgb(0,0,0); FONT-STYLE: normal; ORPHANS: 2; WIDOWS: 2; DISPLAY: inline !important; LETTER-SPACING: normal; TEXT-INDENT: 0px; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration-style: initial; text-decoration-color: initial

param.span: The stream to use for the output of the PDF conversion.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Create(System.IO.Stream,Xceed.Document.NET.DocumentTypes)
member.summary: Creates a DocX Document using a Stream.
member.returns: A DocX object which represents the document.
member.param: The Stream to create the document from.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Create(System.String,Xceed.Document.NET.DocumentTypes)
member.summary: Creates a DocX Document using a fully qualified or relative filename.
member.returns: A DocX object which represents the document.
member.param: The fully qualified or relative filename.

member.name: M:Xceed.Words.NET.DocX.Load(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Loads a document into a DocX object using a Stream.

member.param: The Stream to load the document from.

member.summary: Loads a document into a DocX object using a fully qualified or relative filename.

member.name: P:Xceed.Words.NET.Licenser.LicenseKey
member.summary: Gets or sets the license key used to license this product.
